name: Gemvy
tag_list: gemstone-jewellery, fine-jewellery, designer-jewellery, diamond, rings, earrings, pendants
overview:
Gemvy is a premier online retailer of fine jewellery that is based in Toronto, Canada. Their goal is to provide luxury quality gemstones and diamond jewellery at a more affordable selling price.

They have a huge collection of designer diamond and gemstone jewelry including engagement and anniversary rings, earrings and pendants for women. They cater to all customers from anywhere in the world and offer free shipment across US and Canada.

Their diamonds and gemstones are natural and acquired directly from gem cutters and miners around the world. They never use synthetic or lab-created stones. Each earring is designed in-house and carries a piece of tradition, as well as a dash of innovation and imagination to make the wearer look fabulous.
